item.title: Modus Motus
item.description: Modus Motus will play a part in a performance with Triatu, a percussion ensemble. A first draft will be presented on June 7th in Den Blank, Overijse

item.title: Modus Motus
item.description:
You can still go, play and enjoy Modus Motus in Destelheide, Dworp. But don't forget to drop the Gate Fairy Lies Jacob a line first.
phone nr +32 (0)2 380 39 15
